StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetProgramTypes]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
/* SELECT THE DISTINCT PROGRAM CODES AND THEIR DESCRIPTIONS THAT MEET THE FOLLOWING CONDITIONS: PREFERENCE_END_DATE IS NULL OR PREFERENCE_END_DATE HAS NOT EXPIRED */ SELECT DISTINCT PT.PROGRAM_TYPE_CODE, PT.PROGRAM_TYPE_DESCRIPTION FROM PROGRAM_TYPE PT LEFT OUTER JOIN PROGRAM_DUTY_PREFERENCE PDP ON PT.PROGRAM_TYPE_CODE = PDP.PROGRAM_CODE WHERE PDP.PREFERENCE_END_DATE IS NULL OR DATEDIFF(DAY, PDP.PREFERENCE_END_DATE, GETDATE()) <= 0 ORDER BY PT.PROGRAM_TYPE_DESCRIPTION
